TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PopupEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在显示工具提示之前引发类的事件。The event of the class is raised before a ToolTip is displayed. 此事件的处理程序接收类型为的参数。The handler for this event receives a parameter of type . 此参数提供有关工具提示的信息, 并使你能够通过属性修改工具提示的大小。This parameter provides information about the ToolTip and enables you to modify the size of the ToolTip through the property. 由于派生自, 因此处理程序还可以阻止显示工具提示。Because derives from , the handler can also stop the ToolTip from being displayed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. 在此示例中, 事件处理程序报告事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件, 并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件, 请考虑将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码, 请将其粘贴到包含名为 `ToolTip1`的类型的实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolTip1`. 然后, 确保事件处理程序与事件相关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数的参数用于初始化相应的、具有相似名称的属性。The parameters to the constructor are used to initialize the corresponding, similarly named properties. 如果`associatedControl`拥有的窗口`null`的类型不是, 则该参数可以为。The `associatedControl` parameter can be `null` if the owning window is not of type .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于可以 通过方法将与多个控件关联, 因此可以使用属性来确定与事件关联的控件。 Because you can associate the with multiple controls through the method, you can use the property to determine which control the event is associated with. 如果要基于关联控件执行不同的工具提示自定义, 这会很有帮助。This is helpful if you want to perform different ToolTip customization based on the associated control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中, 事件处理程序报告事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件, 并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件, 请考虑将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码, 请将其粘贴到包含名为 `ToolTip1`的类型的实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolTip1`. 然后, 确保事件处理程序与事件相关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 获取此 要绑定到的窗口。

span.span: Gets the window to which this is bound.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当某个窗口被另一个窗口拥有时, 拥有的窗口将最小化并在所有者窗口中关闭。When a window is owned by another window, the owned window is minimized and closed with the owner window. 所有者窗体后面也从不会显示拥有的窗口。Owned windows are also never displayed behind their owner form. 在这种情况下, 工具提示由本机 Win32 窗口 (由属性表示) 所拥有。In this case, the ToolTip is owned by the native Win32 window, represented by the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中, 事件处理程序报告事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件, 并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件, 请考虑将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码, 请将其粘贴到包含名为 `ToolTip1`的类型的实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolTip1`. 然后, 确保事件处理程序与事件相关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the ToolTip is displayed as a standard rectangular or a balloon window.

value.span: 如果工具提示在气球状窗口中显示，则为 ，否则，如果使用标准矩形窗口，则为 。

span.span: if the ToolTip is displayed in a balloon window; otherwise, if a standard rectangular window is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于工具提示的窗口类型是在 类的方法中指定的。The type of window used for the ToolTip is specified in the method of the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中, 事件处理程序报告事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件, 并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件, 请考虑将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码, 请将其粘贴到包含名为 `ToolTip1`的类型的实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolTip1`. 然后, 确保事件处理程序与事件相关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 获取或设置工具提示的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the size of the ToolTip.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使事件处理程序可以更改工具提示窗口的大小。The property enables the event handler to change the size of the ToolTip window. 通常与类的成员一起使用, 来自定义工具提示的外观。 is often used in conjunction with the members of the class to customize the appearance of ToolTips. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中, 事件处理程序报告事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件, 并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件, 请考虑将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码, 请将其粘贴到包含名为 `ToolTip1`的类型的实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolTip1`. 然后, 确保事件处理程序与事件相关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
